info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.operate.ping

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "system"
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

parameters.name: site
parameters.description:
Site Name

x-example: "value"
Name of the site from which ping is initiated

pingPingRequest.description: Request to run ping to a destination
pingPingRequest.title: Ping Request

count.description:
Number of ping requests to be sent

Example: ` "3"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 64
count.title: Count

interval.description:
Interval between ping requests, in milliseconds

Example: ` "1000"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 300
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 10000
interval.title: Interval

namespace.description:
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

Example: ` "system"`
namespace.title: Namespace

node.description:
Name of the node from which ping is initiated

Example: ` "master-0"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 64
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 1
node.title: Node Name

pkt_size.description:
Ping packet size

Example: ` "64"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 64
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 9216
pkt_size.title: Packet Size

site.description:
Name of the site from which ping is initiated

Example: ` "value"`
site.title: Site Name

avg_rtt.description:
Average round trip time

Example: ` "27 ms"`
avg_rtt.title: Average RTT

dest.description:
Destination address used for ping

Example: ` "192.168.10.25"`
dest.title: Destination

max_rtt.description:
Maximum round trip time

Example: ` "30 ms"`
max_rtt.title: Max RTT

min_rtt.description:
Minimum round trip time

Example: ` "25 ms"`
min_rtt.title: Min RTT

schemaEmpty.description: This can be used for messages where no values are needed
schemaEmpty.title: Empty

schemaHostIdentifier.description: Host Identifier identifies a host, either by its DNS name (hostname) or by its IP address.
schemaHostIdentifier.title: Host Identifier

hostname.description:
Exclusive with [ip]
 DNS name of the host

Example: ` "myhost.volterra.io"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.hostname: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256
hostname.title: Hostname

ip.description:
Exclusive with [hostname]
 IP address of the host

Example: ` "192.168.1.1"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.ip: true
ip.title: IP

schemaInterfaceIdentifier.description: Interface Identifier identifies one or all interfaces on a node
schemaInterfaceIdentifier.title: Interface Identifier

intf.description:
Exclusive with [any_intf]
 Name of the chosen interface on the node

Example: ` "eth0"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 1
intf.title: Interface Name
